description:
Follow winding pathways to the finish line. Waterproof and lightweight trail running shoes offer a comfortable ride, whether you're tackling 5km or 50. The durable rubber outsole offers grip on rooty and rocky sections, and a waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry even during Mother Nature's worst moods.

  • Synthetic knit mesh upper breathes well to keep your feet cool and comfortable
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable bootie adds weather protection
  • VERSARUN cushioning packs plenty of underfoot comfort
  • EVA midsole for lightweight comfort
  • GRID heel system cushions your feet, run after run
  • Durable rubber outsole with 4.5mm lugs for traction on loose or muddy surfaces
name: Saucony Excursion TR16 Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Women's
